text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Izakaya Clerk
President

Alrighty then!
How many in your party?
Three, please.
Right this way, please.

And also, seaweed salad, tofu with sesame dressing,
soy sauce-pickled nagaimo, avocado tuna mayo...
Oh, and some deep-fried fish fins, please~
Anything else, President?
No.
That'll be all for now.

Thank you for your hard work / Thank you /
Thanks a bunch~

The first thing you learned after becoming a
working adult was... was it how to order at a party?

Ah...
Haha, please forget about that.
Oh... Well then,

What was the first thing you learned
after joining 283?
Oh, that's...

You don't have to say.
Hazuki, don't pry.
President, do you remember?
...Who knows.

...How have you both been lately?
Seems like you're both quite busy.

Yeah...
But not as much as the President.
Stop it, none of that.

We're all putting in a little extra effort now...
since everyone's gearing up for the stage.
...It's amazing, everyone.

To be honest, I was worried that having cameras for close-up
filming might make it difficult to practice or discuss things.

But, it seems we didn't need to worry about that.
If anything, it seems like our motivation has gone up...

The whiteboard too, right?
It made you happy, didn't it?

Yeah...!
President, you saw it too, the whiteboard...!
...Yeah.

L'Antica was the first to write on it, but now
it's become a board for all the units to interact with...!

...I think there are more tough times during practice than fun ones.
But, seeing everyone working hard and enjoying themselves...

It makes me happy...
and makes me feel like I need to work hard too...

However...
I suppose you're both going home today.

Uh, um... Yes! I mean...
I was thinking of going back to the office for a moment...

Make sure to get some proper rest in bed, okay~?
You'll collapse if you rely on catnaps and cup noodles all the time~

Haha...
I'll be careful.

Take a break once in a while.
I'd be troubled if you collapsed.
Sorry for the interruption, here's your drink...!
This is just for today, making it sweeter.

What will you both order next?
Here's the menu~

Oh, we have a special large serving of pudding a la mode...!
President, you liked sweet things, right?
...You're being too loud.

Can I eat three servings by myself~?
Just kidding~
...Do you want to be scolded?
